urls.title: Secretary of State appointed vacancies for the Environment Agency Boar
urls.description: Recently Government announced the Secretary of State, working closely with the Chair of the Environment Agency, is seeking to appoint three new members to the Board of the Environment Agency. Applications are encouraged by 2 June.

tweets.text:
Three new exciting opportunities to become a member of the @EnvAgency board are available, to find out more and apply click below 🏞️⬇️ @NFUtweets @NFUPolitical  
https://t.co/1M05DSAAia

Flood Re shares the ambitions within the @EnvAgency's FCERM Strategy and will be working closely with @BritishInsurers and @BIBAbroker to develop a specialist directory of brokers & insurers to help customers who otherwise find it difficult to get flood insurance #FCERMStrategy https://t.co/cfTmaFdBwG

🌍 We’ve published the #FCERMStrategy Action Plan. 

It sets out the steps we’ll take to create climate resilient places and to prepare our nation for the future.  

Read more: https://t.co/orMjcLMRuQ

#TogetherForOurPlanet #COP26 @The_WMA https://t.co/yeTB8Isl0C

@davemh72 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Tough tits! They should have thought about this before they let a known criminal run a landfill. And turned a blind eye to all sorts. Dock the wages take pay cuts off the responsible people to blame use their money differently somehow to fix the mess THEY made.

Last year the @EnvAgency set out our vision for a nation ready for, and resilient to, flooding and coastal change to the year 2100.

Our new action plan sets out the steps we’ll take to create climate resilient places, infrastructure and prepare the nation for the future 👇 https://t.co/HgZ5bsg2Um

SPOT THE BALL (Difference) COMPETITION.

On 2 consecutive days in May the EA issue 2 different press releases. But are they?

Transpires that apart from the title they are complete carbon clones of each other. Ho hum.

Lazy or mismanaged? https://t.co/qx74Bp1bbE

The @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA definitely need more money, they’re saying they’ve no money to monitor the landfill longer term - we’ve not even solved the fumes yet so this is v v concerning! I don’t buy the due diligence tho, he was already known to them @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/O0evVeHSDu

@EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MattHancock we’re dealing with a situation none of us have put ourselves into, we have our own problems too. It makes dealing with anything harder we’re week and warn down mentally #StopTheStink #MentalHealthAwareness @StinkStopthe we can’t take much more

@wellycath @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL The stench is horrendous at Galingale view

Over the past few months we've been busy producing a new film highlighting our Natural Flood Management work on the River Twyver, a project which we've been undertaking in partnership with @GloucesterCity, the @EnvAgency and some amazing landowners!

Film: https://t.co/sYBIZGeS0m https://t.co/hOjI8CJAvc

We can now see it’s not the @EnvAgency being scared of an orphaned site , they’re scared of footing the bill to restore it . It’s a case of The EA with no money , red with no interest and us in the middle with no quality of life . @StinkStopthe

In North Yorkshire this week working with @JBARisk and @EnvAgency collecting data to help create #hydraulicmodels to improve #floodrisk mapping.

#survey #flooding #korecphotocomp #trimble https://t.co/qfWhWhjPK0

urls.title: | Environment Agency Board Member
urls.description: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs Environment, Food & Rural Affairs D irector of Floods and Water, Defra • Departmental Official Chair, Environment Agency • Representative of Organisation Chair, Highways England • Independent Member • sets the strategy, drives performance and holds the organisation to account; • provides stewardship for public funds and environmental outcomes. The Board is made up of a Chair, Chief Executive and up to 14 other members. The Board has a collegiate style. It

urls.title: ‘It’s terrifying’: the English village overwhelmed by landfill stink
urls.description: For miles around Walleys Quarry near Newcastle-under-Lyme, people have reported waking up in the night struggling to breathe

tweets.text: This is in Silverdale, #NewcastleUnderLyme #Staffordshire - landfill related. Come on, @EnvAgency - #StopTheStink.    https://t.co/pj1wIergwr

@BenM_Anderson @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @Feargal_Sharkey @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @ChrisGPackham @RedIndustries2 Thank you. It's having a massive impact on domestic animals and wildlife as well as the ecosystem in general. We have badger sets on the periphery of the landfill & they're affected during breading season. I believe bee's & other pollinators are also under attack.
@StinkStopthe

I would like to see the @EnvAgency & @DefraGovUK call some scientific experts in to solve the issue. I can’t believe the country who cracked the covid vaccine can’t find a solution to this. Get the right people on the job @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @JamesBevanEA #StopTheStink https://t.co/r86foTUlcL

urls.title: ‘It’s terrifying’: the English village overwhelmed by landfill stink
urls.description: For miles around Walleys Quarry near Newcastle-under-Lyme, people have reported waking up in the night struggling to breathe

tweets.text:
Today hundreds of children are breathing in toxic air in Silverdale due to toxic landfill fumes, the environmental agency @EnvAgencyNW is not working quick enough, this is an emergency. Please share and if you can donate https://t.co/kDuVm2eZef
https://t.co/aIHidTSozg
https://t.co/8xy1G5gL6H

Poor management and regulation. Many factors involved - inputs, capping, gas and leachate management. A strongly gassing landfill is a beast and yet ⁦@EnvAgency⁩ have allowed inexperienced operators permits across UK. Landfill gas is carcinogenic. https://t.co/2xoq9tB31q

We’ve completed the flume channel at Holderness Drain Pumping Station for @jnbentley on behalf of the @EnvAgency 

Work continues on the next phase of the project.

https://t.co/OIVbpnOwEl https://t.co/90hqDsjPCd

tweets.text: @Samanth33412592 @tw33tie1 @EnvAgencyMids The surface water and the flooding of the infrastructure, I believe is sorted. What that leaves is the mystery as to why it still smells. These are the questions @EnvAgencyMids will be asking.

24 leaky dams in various styles, recently completed nr Troutbeck. Huge thanks to Rob at #arbclear. Part of Glenderamackin NFM project. #slowtheflow. Funded by #weg and @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/jqq1M0xyMb

@sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @daera_ni @Mullaghglass123 @edwinpootsmla When these landfills are closed down, there needs to be public inquiries to find out the truth of what has gone on! @Mullaghglass123 @StinkStopthe #Accountability

@HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @Feargal_Sharkey @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @ChrisGPackham Oh don't get me started on that topic! Right now though, I genuinely think the @RedIndustries2 Walleys Quarry disaster is the most urgent in the country. And I  imagine it's a wildlife as well as a human one.

Via the NEW Diglis fish pass, twaite shad can now swim past #Worcester on their #SevernShadRun for the first time in nearly 180yrs! 🎉🐟🎉 
Please watch & share our video! #FollowTheShad #FishMigration @CanalRiverTrust @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @HeritageFundM_E @LIFEprogramme https://t.co/kzh7NFPljc
